name: Python-mellat
body:
# Welcome to Bank Mellat Python API This code will connect your web application to Iran Bank Mellat E-Payment Gatewy. ### Install : Just download zip or tar file and include it in your code! ### supported methods : bpPayRequest
bpVerifyRequest
bpSettleRequest
bpInquiryRequest
bpReversalRequest
### Usage: According to Bank Documents, you need to these steps :
1- Get a payment ref by calling `bpPayRequest` and args
2- Redirect user with POST method to Bank page => http://123123.shaparak.ir/payment?RefId=
3- User will return to your website after payment
4- Verify State by calling : `bpVerifyRequest`
5- If Result is True and Res Code is 0, Then prepare for settle by `bpSettleRequest`
## More info : Bank Documentations


Saeed Auditore
